Behaviour is a joke of a developer. They can never seem to get anything right. From ruining characters to ruining character models for no reason, this game is a mess. They rather hop on the NFT train then fix their game. many people bought pin head for the voice lines and now they are removed? If you buy this game hoping for it to be fixed later on don't bother. We've been hoping they'd fix the game since 2017. I will never recommend this game to anyone.

Me Parace un Juego muy original y con mucha variedad, Es muy raro encontrar fallos o bugs y tambien es muy divertido es una combinacion de muchas cosas buenas sin duda yo recomendaria este juego para que lo juegues pero siempre te recomiendo que juegues con amigos creeme lo vas a disfrutar mas

good game

El juego es bueno como muchos más. Si bien puedes encontrarte un hacker (tramposo) dentro de alguna partida, puedes terminar rápidamente la partida e iniciar otra. El mayor problema aquí es su comunidad, muchas veces toxica porque no juegas como ellos quieren o existen "reglas" que la misma comunidad invento como el famoso "tuneleo o campear" como dicen... cuando el mismo juego y la pagina oficial deja claro que como asesino tu objetivo es matar a todos sin importar como. Así que si puedes lidiar con ese tipo de gente o normas inventadas siguiéndolas o ignorándolas, podrás disfrutar del juego sin ningún problema.

Los problemas de arreglo de bugs, es otra historia... eso queda más a las manos de los desarrolladores que pueden molestar o tomarlo de forma tranquila dependiendo de tu animo y  lo recurrente que pase a cada persona.
gg

This game will keep you on the edge of your seat whether you're the killer or a survivor! many characters to choose from and plenty of things to complete such as the bloodweb for perks and survivor/killer upgrades for offerings and ad-ons. They even have goals in the game to aquire additional bloodpoints to complete the bloodweb.

I have spent countless hours playing this game, it turned me suicidal with all the maintenance this game comes across while just enjoying it, I have been thinking about ending it all, BHVR needs to hand the game over to a company that actually knows what they're doing. Half the time they barely know what their doing or talking about. I sat and stared at the night sky in hopes that one day.... This game could be actually good and not make me want to off myself.

With that being said, I really do recommend this game! It's the best!

I actually enjoyed this game for awhile, and would recommend it for a group of 5 friends to play, but the multiple times they've introduced skill-based matchmaking resulted in a noticeable drop in the quality of the games, and now with the support of NFTs, I'm out. It's a real shame.

Unfortunately my most played game. Gameplay is fine but can easily become monotonous on the survivor side, as well as tilting for both sides due to players that only want to give others a bad experience. BHVR loves to get their hands on as much of your money as possible, through expensive cosmetics and shady deals with NFTs. I will commend them for not having any purchases that give advantages. Hackers have become a major problem and the developers having even acknowledged it. Constant game breaks, annoying bugs, and year long issues are ignored for long enough to make anyone pissed. Not a day goes by that I don't regret getting into this game.
Its a great bonding experience with friends.
